DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study : To determine mass balance route elimination BIIB074 know metabolite follow administration single oral dose BIIB074 healthy male participant To describe pharmacokinetics ( PK ) BIIB074 know metabolite disposition profile total radioactivity whole blood plasma follow single oral dose . The secondary objective study : To assess safety tolerability BIIB074 healthy participant To identify characterize additional metabolite BIIB074 plasma , urine , feces .
DOC.criteria: Key All subject must practice effective contraception study willing able continue contraception 90 day administration study treatment . Must good health determine Investigator , base medical history screening evaluation . Key History clinically significant cardiac , endocrine , gastrointestinal , hematologic , hepatic , immunologic , metabolic , urologic , pulmonary , neurologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , renal disease , major disease , determine Investigator . Previous exposure BIIB074 . Other unspecified reason , opinion Investigator Biogen , make subject unsuitable enrollment . NOTE : Other protocol define Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply .
